New Records: Jordan Walker is the first player in nearly 100 years to go 5-for-5 with a home run, three RBI, and four runs against the New York Yankees since Al Simmons in 1929.
Key Match Events: Jordan Walker's historic 5-for-5 performance with a home run, three RBI, four runs, and a stolen base.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The St. Louis Cardinals won their first-ever game at the new Yankee Stadium and their first road win against New York since Game 5 of the 1964 World Series.
Others: Jordan Walker struggled in the beginning of the 2024 season but had a better performance in the game analyzed.
